annotations.description: A color changing drink to celebrate The Original Legend of Zelda! Take this, it's dangerous to go alone! ********************************** Butterfly Pea Blo...
annotations.title: Zelda's 2nd Potion & Water of Life | How to Drink

textContent:
2 oz. -or- 60 ml. Blue Rum (or White Rum)
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Simple Syrup
.25 oz. -or- 8 ml. Maraschino
Shake and Pour into bottle
Add:
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Lime Juice
~ 3 oz. -or- 90 ml. Seltzer

Combine for color changing completion

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u5bykPwlvxU
title: 2nd Potion
